Reviews.Title: “good location but not hygienic and poor maintained”
Reviews.Author: PeaceIndia
Reviews.Content: The only good thing is the location else it is poorly maintained and has lot of insects. The linens are not cleaned and there is poor maintenence. There is insects and coacroaches in the rooms which shows poor maintenance. The staff is poor and rude. This is not worth the money

Reviews.Title: “GREAT LOCATION ONLY”
Reviews.Author: azanov
Reviews.Content: It is old,unhygenic and small. Quite basic hotel. The hotel is well located but is far from being a comfortable one. The hotel needs to be renovated . The only plus point is that its close to the metro station (there's no hotel this near to metro) and to little india for all the indian/muslim tourists who wouldnt face any problems in terms of food. I chose this hotel bcos it's right in front of the metro. and right in front of Mustaffa Shopping Center 24h. Since it's 24 hour u can go shopping just across the street any time you want. So if dont mind the place you want to catch a nap, but with a very convenient location. Go for this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel not so great but you will save money as the location of the hotel is very prime for Indian Travelers”
Reviews.Author: ArunAggarwalayuve
Reviews.Content: I visited Singapore for the first time as you know SG is very expensive city to live and travel I stayed in Fortuna Hotel as i belongs to a budget catagory. Hotel provide only basic services do not aspect any thingh special for you. You need to carry your luggage by your own to and from the room no bell boys. Rooms don't have ventilation or windows so you will not see outside your room, AC are working fine, They provide Shampoo,Soap, towel and Tea Coffee machine in the room with one jub of water. If you need any crocery other than this they dont provide as they dont have kitchen in the hotel. Breakfast is served in Park Baluchhi Resturant situated on the ground floor with fixed menu Bread Butter, Jam , Puri Aloo Subji, Upma Sambhar, Egg. Tea, Coffee and Juice good for budget travelers but you will get bored eating same breakfast everyday. Rooms are not so hygenic as compared to Singapore standards. Now i want to tell you the basic benifit of the hotel. Its is situated opposite of Mustafa (only 24/7 shopping mall in Singapore) best for Indian Travelers. So many Indian resturants with in 2 mins walking as you are in Little India Area some of them are pure veg also. Taxi Stand, Bus Stand, MRT (Singapore Metro), Hippo Bus Stop only few steps of walking. Niranjan the electronics pradise as every body wants LCD/LED in very near only 3-4 mins walk cheapest electronis stores in Singapore. At the ground floor of the hotel there is a city tour travel agent named Star Tours gives you genunie advise and cheaper city travel deals so you save lot of money i saved more than Rs.15000 as per his advise the guy is really genuine and friendly. Travel Singapore its really nice. there are other hotels in near by like Park Royal, Claremoun also but Fortuna is the cheapest one and have lot of benefit in terms of money. You will save more than 300 SGD of Taxi staying in this hotel or Area in 5 days of travel.

Reviews.Title: “worst stay ever!”
Reviews.Author: Shenie
Reviews.Content: as far as budget hotels go, this is the worst experience I have had so far. It should be mentioned that the rooms allocated to us was dirty, smelly and without any ventilation. worst, there were cockroaches all over the room. felt as if we were staying in a dungeon. on request of a better room, we were informed that since the booking was via internet, new rooms cannot be allocated as one particular floor is dedicated to internet bookings. finally, we were given better rooms on another floor. the staff is rude and uncooperative. the rooms were unclean. even with minimum standards applied. toilets did not have shower curtains and where cubicles were fixed, the door was missing, thus the toilets get wet after every wash. house keeping refused to provide extra bath mats as they can only give one per room.

Reviews.Title: “There are better choices than this”
Reviews.Author: mizalta
Reviews.Content: If your from india and your travel agent advises you this hotel please stay away as it is old,unhygenic and small.the hotel is well located but is far from being a comfortable one.the lobby is small with just one toilet.this was hard on us as we were travelling in a big group and all of us were waiting for the check in at 1 30 . The toilets are old and shabby,tv's dont work fine.the hotel needs to be renovated . The price paid for it is really not worth as there are better ones on offer at the same price and locality . The only plus point is that its close to the metro station and to little india for all the indian tourists who wouldnt face any problems in terms of food . But all put together it was a bitter experience . I would stay away and recommend everyone to do so .. Cheers.

Reviews.Title: “Veg food , central location & great for Aam Aadmi :)”
Reviews.Author: Mahendra S
Reviews.Content: Note- If you are looking for vegetarian food in Singapore, this is the place to be.The fortuna hotel, Singapore is located near the Mustafa mall. It is located in front of the Indian restaurant Sagar Ratna, not only because of which it has an Indian taste to it. The reason I say this is it has all the features that make it look similar to a 2 or may be 3 star Indian hotel. The Hotel has an in-built restaurant where one can get buffet breakfast and dinner at affordable rates.Well, the breakfast is complementary. There are a lot of Indian dishes in the menu. Also there are lots of restaurants around serving Indian food. After we finalized our trip to Singapore 3 weeks back, this was the hotel we settled for coz of veg food after a deliberate research & reading reviews on Tripadvisor.Then we started looking for a travel company & asked 3-4 for quotations.Finally , We got Antilog Vacations for arranging the tour as they r were suggested by few friends.I must say we got a splendid service & low rates from them.The tour started with a very good note with our tour representative waiting for us at sharp time at airport. The Rooms/bathrooms are clean and comfortable, not very big though, score about 7 on 10 for me. The staff is friendly and courteous. Location is definitely a plus. It’s very well connected with buses, MRT and taxis all around. Mustafa Centre Shopping Mall (24hrs) is just across the street. Mustafa center gives you the best deal in entire Singapore and they accept INR also.Mustafa Center Money Exchange gives you the best rates in Singapore. And you dont need to hire taxi for anything except airport transfers & Sentosa. Don't expect too much since it's only a 3 star hotel but the location is excellent. If you are looking for luxury and time to spend in hotel, this is not the place. But in case you are on a business trip or planning an economy tour for urself or some client, just the right place.. Great value for money

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable stay”
Reviews.Author: Shafinaah
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Singapore and stayed at Fortuna Hotel for 2 nights. We checked into the hotel at about 11am since there were some rooms available at that time. We were given a room on the 6th floor and the room was comfortable. Don't expect too much since it's only a 3 star hotel but the location is excellent. It's opposite the Mustafa center and there are lots of restaurants nearby. We didn't eat at the hotel's restaurant for breakfast. We travelled as a family with 2 small children and we didn't find any difficulties. Knowing how expensive everything is in Singapore, this hotel is good value for money. Recommended if you want to see the hustle and bustle of Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Average Property”
Reviews.Author: Vishal75
Reviews.Content: I just came back from Singapore and i had stayed at this hotel... It is having a good location but average property... The breakfast they provided at park belluchi was not good.... The stay was comfortable as I had an upgraded room to deluxe.....

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: Chanderkiran N
Reviews.Content: The price, service, location, quality of rooms and food incl. breakfast is just excellent for traveller. It is opposite to Mustafa biggest shopping complex which is opened 24 hours. So day time you can go around the island and rest for few hours and shop in the night very comfortably. 3 Min walk from MRT Station. I visit with my family every alternate year. I will be again there in May/Jun 2012. We only stay here. We did tried few other places but none of my family members specially my grand daughter 8 years old only loves to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “GOOD PROPERTY FOR BUDGET TRAVELLER”
Reviews.Author: SAMAREN
Reviews.Content: The location of this hotel is fantastic,just on the main road and opposite the happening Mustafa Shopping Centre.Rooms are spacious and comfotable with 24 hour water-supply and a panoramic view of the city in case you get a main road facing room. The Hotel has an in-built restaurant where one can get buffet breakfast and dinner at affordable rates.Well, the breakfast is complementary.The tarrif is below SGD 100 they offer about 40-50% discount. I recommend this hotel for the Budget traveller to Singapore who plan to have a thorough criss-cross of the place for a stay of little over 3 nights.And the traveller has the advantage of boarding the Starmart coaches to KL from right infront of Park Royal Hotel which is a walkable distance from Hotel Fortuna. Well, that's all.Enjoy your stay at Fortuna.

Reviews.Title: “Good location for indian travellers”
Reviews.Author: AMEETS06
Reviews.Content: THe hotel is very strategically located more so for Indian Travellers since Little India is just within walking distance. Also being opposite FARRER STATION its connectivity via trains is also very good. Also MUstafa Shopping center is stone throw away. The Hotel Rooms are good and neat. THe little shop selling knick knacks just outside the hotel is also very good and very helpful. The breakfast was Indian so for us it was good.

Reviews.Title: “Avearage Hotel for room starting from 3200INR per person”
Reviews.Author: Lovely N
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel from 23rd Aug till 29th Aug in a double superior room. This room gives you the no Exp as if u r staying in Singapore.It is located in a very fine location where MRT is just at the back of your hotel.Rooms are not so clean ans very small.Breakfast is just ok.Good value for money for Indians. You can choose Park Royal Hotel instaed which is alos located in the same area and is much better than this.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Experience”
Reviews.Author: janardhan54
Reviews.Content: I had stayed in this hotel with my family in june 2011. The travel agent told me that it is a three star hotel located in little India. Except location as it is located just opposite to Mustafa Shopping Mall , nothing special in it. Horrible rooms, very bad front office & the room which was allotted to me was a makeshift room wthout ventilation & light. Even at 1 p.m. you have to enter the room with torch as it was pitch dark. The room & the toilet was stinking. The front office people were not at all bothered when I protested & only the next day after I spoke to my Travel Agent, they shifted me to another room which was ok. It is a budget hotel patronised by the cheap travellers. The breakfast served in the balluchi restaurant attached to the hotel was horrible.

Reviews.Title: “Good Location\Clean Rooms..What Else you need!!!”
Reviews.Author: Anshley
Reviews.Content: I stayed there end of dec 10 with my my wife and son...superb location..MRT just at the back..mustapha opposite...there is 7\11 also...the hotel room is clean..the staff is courteous..dont expect 5 star treatment..who cares when the hotel is meant only for sleeping and there are so much thing to do out there..will definitely go back there next time i go again to Singapore

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel -in the center of Singapore”
Reviews.Author: amesh1974
Reviews.Content: excellent Hotel in the center of City , Near By little India One must stay there..it is near to Mustafa center, staff were good and rooms are neat & Clean one must stay there.hotel is in prime location and all restaurant and mustafa centere is just nearby even yo can shop at niranjana, mustafa and othere stree store just opposite to hotel side and walking Distance

Reviews.Title: “Perfect no-frills hotel for Indians with Indian Tastes and requirements.”
Reviews.Author: Chandrachoor
Reviews.Content: In case you have a habit of staying in Indian localities during your foreign trips, I guess this hotel does justice to your requirements. I would rate this hotel as 2 Star, with no frills and fancies and I would advise you not to keep any expectations in case you want to enjoy your stay here. The food is bad. But, just start walking on the pavement by this hotel, you will get hundreds of good Indian restaurants. Best thing about this hotel is: 1) Rooms/bathrooms are clean and comfortable 2) Very well connected with buses, MRT and taxis all around. 3) Mustafa Centre Shopping Mall (24hrs) is just across the street. Mustafa center gives you the best deal in entire Singapore and they accept INR also. 4) Mustafa Center Money Exchange gives you the best rates in Singapore.\ Advise: There are better hotels in the vicinity that you should certainly opt for, over this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “very good hotel for Indians,with MRT & Indian restaurants nearby.”
Reviews.Author: sudhir_an
Reviews.Content: Hotel Fortuna,Singapore. I stayed at the hotel for 4 days in october with my wife and kid of 12 years.very comfortable & clean room,good south indian restaurants closeby and farer park mrt station just behind. sudhir

Reviews.Title: “very good location”
Reviews.Author: krishnabangalore
Reviews.Content: fortuna hotel singapore ,very good location for indian tourists,hotel maintainance much tto be desired,friendly staff,very bad breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Please avoid athis fortune”
Reviews.Author: draveller
Reviews.Content: This name in Singapore should ring a bell to avoid this one. We had a real encouter with this hotel with rooms which were not maintained. washbsins with blocks, stint and dust allover the place; and kudoos to the agent who booked room for us in this place.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money for indian”
Reviews.Author: prashantholidayzone
Reviews.Content: Its best 2* hotel in singapore for indians. Its in little india infront of sagar ratna indian restaurant .And u dnt need to hire taxi for anything except airport transfers & Sentosa. neat and clean rooms but litttle small as usaual in this budget.Over all value for money specially for indians. Prashant For Holiday Zone Delhi

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in singapore as compared to other hotels.”
Reviews.Author: vishal_kanwar
Reviews.Content: Good hotel for Indians in Singapore compared to other hotels.Excellent Indian food and good location.Very near to Musatafa mall were u can get almost everything.

Reviews.Title: “NRP_FORTUNA”
Reviews.Author: nrprasad_78
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in a very convinient place for Shopping, as this is situated stone throw from Mustafa Shopping Centre, Transport Etc. This is very ideal for stay, specially for South Indians as this located very close to restaurants, who serves south indian foods. Only draw back of this hotel is there is food available in this hotel, not even Coffee / Tea which guests look for it, in the morning and in the evenings. Also, wish add here that comparatively with other hotels in the area, this hotel is little expensive, for the kind of service & facilities provided in this hotel. NR PRASAD

Reviews.Title: “romantic shopping”
Reviews.Author: pankajdash2010
Reviews.Content: its located just opposite to mustafa shopping complex which is too convinient for travellers to shop at anytime. center located to city ienjoyed staying their

Reviews.Title: “An average hotel”
Reviews.Author: Naveen kumar G
Reviews.Content: I stayed here during my transit in singapore as its located just in front of the mustafa shopping complex. The hotel is good for a day's stay, the hotel provides basic facility of JUST Stay and no entertainment / no break fast. The rooms are decent and clean but with no other facilities being available, i feel the hotel was average.

Reviews.Title: “It's really O.K. ( if compare with Aspinal hotel)”
Reviews.Author: navet22
Reviews.Content: I had booked Aspinal Hotel on internet but when I went there at noon,everything is contrast as I saw pictures on internet!!!! The entering so dark,no light coz save electricity!!receptionist not friendly much, room very small,untidy,broken air-con,bathroom unclean as well.So.I changed to Fortuna Hotel at that day,can walk from Aspinal Hotel around 5 min.It's really fine ,friendly receptionist although a little high rate.

Reviews.Title: “Paradise for Shopping..”
Reviews.Author: amitmonakapoor
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect comfortable hotel for families travelling for the first time to Singapore.. With Mustafa across the street & plenty of Indian restaurants.. Very comfortable stay & decent rooms

Reviews.Title: “Good tranit hotel”
Reviews.Author: koolguysg
Reviews.Content: Fortuna hotel is a hotel that is located near Mustafa Center Little India. i had to stay in this hotel as the accomodation was provided by my company for 3 months. its a okay hotel the room are quite okay and dont much expect from the hotel but the cost is little bit on the higher end compared to the other hotels i have stayed in singapore

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't go again”
Reviews.Author: globetrotting1101
Reviews.Content: The room was sparse and room service not up to standard. There was no facility for internet in the room or even in the hotel, not even wireless. There was renovation going on at the hotel itself on the outside. I didn't have any bad experiences but totally not worth the SGD100 per day I was charged.

Reviews.Title: “Will Never Stay at This Hotel again”
Reviews.Author: Palan
Reviews.Content: A day in Singapore was available for onward trip to Japan. Booked at the Airport Counter, as no other Hotel was available. Location was really good, as was opposite most famous Shopping Center - Mustafa. Nearby Indian Restaurants were also an attraction. But that was all. A very rude staff. No interest in Guests well being. No help in Luggage Handling, horrible and unclean rooms. I would never recommend this place to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “just a hotel with bed”
Reviews.Author: AR R
Reviews.Content: It is just a hotel with bed-offered. Nothing more in it.Except that ,it is In the main road of Singapore and with a good location. Hotel staff needs lots to be trainde to say what is hospitality industry. rooms are ok, but poor bath and wash rooms. Poor house keeping. Very strict about check in and out times. No assistance at all to help you to the room or even for heavy luggages. No room service and absolute minimum one can expect from their staff. Being in Serangoon road, in the middle of shopping area and access to all transports and good restaurants, specially Indian, it has the advantage. But this is a better one than its neighboring hotels in this area. But it does not mean i would recommend it to all. If one stays as a trasit passenger for max 2 days it is ok. Nothing more. No internet here.

Reviews.Title: “Location Written All Over it”
Reviews.Author: fallw
Reviews.Content: We Had taken a short break of south east asia and this was sandwiched in between our locations of Thailand and Malayasia and we were first shocked to see the outward appearance of the place, you must see it to believe it, for a city like singapore which is known for its buildings this looked like a hotel from interior south india externally, we were plesantly surprised to see the interior, it is an old hotel agreed, but well maintained, the rooms are small compared to other cities, but not short on basic amenities, we were given a room facing the main road, and viola there stood the icon of singapore MUSTAFA, the very name that rings a lot of bells for people visiting singapore for the 1st time, it has an indian diner next door and State Bank of India is there too, 2 min walk from the metro rail and the hop on hop off bus stop is there too, nice location for people wanting to relax and easy on tarrif too. on the whole a decent place, came to know from a friend who visited recently, the hotel has been properly renovated too.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience”
Reviews.Author: 12345qwert
Reviews.Content: Avoid his hotel though the area is good due to nearby india hotels n shoppin arena still dont go for this hotel. the staff is so rude. Cleanliness is totally dumped and the view from the hotel is also pathetic. Service is bad and rooms are terrific.. bathrooms shower neva work toilets r not so good overall PATHETIC. WILL NEVAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA suggest this to ne1.

Reviews.Title: “Unconcerned staff & strictly OK amenities”
Reviews.Author: xanadu06
Reviews.Content: Avoidable hotel to stay while in Singapore: reasons: 1). Rude staff - unconcerned - esp since hotel would be full due to heavy summar vacation rush from India & Indonesia region. 2). Otherwise - nobody would stay here at Fortuna. 3). Staff do not help with hand luggage. "Bell boy" concept is useless. While guests wait for their rooms to be checked in, reception employees do not allow guests to use the guest wash room on ground floor mentioning it is only for "staff". There are no public utilities available at the hotel. 4). From other reviews in Sept '06, we also had same experience of Periplaneta Americana - "cockroach" - small cockroaches in bathrooms - plenty & quite few in rooms also. It seems they have'nt done any plumbing repairs since Sept '06, when someone posted similar complaints on TripAdvisor. They only come & spray once - not bothered again. 5). Toaster also is not working properly & cannot have capacity to cater to 50 breakfast requests at a time. They even have not provided 2 more toasters even at peak season...!! 6). TV in the room was w/o remote inspite of reminders & there was no radio as given on website. Visitors - u may have to pay only slightly more, but AVOID Fortuna. Ankur, Mumbai, India

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Shirya
Reviews.Content: We were 3 families with kids . Our Agent in Pune had earlier booked us in Bencoolen , But according to their local agent in Singapore Mr Singh ; this was super peak season ; so we were put up in Fortuna. A horrible hotel . Okay only for backpackers and those on a shoe string budget.Can you imagine we were denied fresh towels for bath in the morning because we were due to check out at 12.00 clock that day . he breakfast is bad . Toasters dont work there. Baths are unclean ; tubs ( if you are lucky to get a rooom with one) are slippery and inferior .If you have a choice avoid this Hotel and yes the staff is rude Shireesh Joshi Pune
